评论详情: These boho pants are extremely comfortable and very stylish as well. I get many compliments when I wear them. I love my comfy boho pants!
Nice material.

评论概述: LOVE these pants! Very comfy. Would definitely recommend
评论详情: I love these and wear them as often as possible! They're very comfortable and I plan to buy more pairs in other colors. They are a bit sheer, which is fine with the black pair, but I imagine white in this fabric would look see-through.  They're a little bit long for me, but I'm 4'11", 100lbs, and I really don't mind the extra length because they're tighter around the ankle and kind of flop nicely around the feet. You can also pull them up to make them look like a capri style.  They fit well around the waist, not too tight but not loose. They generally have a loose, relaxed fit.  The cons: the pockets are in kind of an odd spot on the thigh and aren't really sturdy enough to carry things. The material is a bit thin so I would recommend hand washing them, or what I do is put them in a washable laundry bag with the washer on the hand-wash setting. You also need to wash them separately for at least the first wash because the color will run.

评论概述: Comfort is 5, quality is 3, so I give them 4 stars.
评论详情: First comment i have... I love these pants. This is the second pair that I have purchased, because they are just so comfortable and flattering. They fit really well. The first pair I own has significant thread pulling and seam separations, even though I've only worn them to lounge around in a couple times and never washed them.  They say hand wash, so thats what I plan to do when they need it. This 2nd pair is of the same quality. There are a couple of pulled or loose threads, even right out of the package never worn. I give the quality a 3 star... maybe even 2! I would expect to be able to wear a pair of comfy pants to lounge and do nothing in plenty of times before any damage to the seams, honestly. Especially for 20$. The pants fit really well and look good on. They're cool in the heat and breathable- but I don't notice that I can completely see through them as some people have stated in reviews. I included a picture with my hand inside, and you can make out my silver ring trough the fabric. That being said, if the quality of the fabric and seams can be improved a bit, these would be my absolute favorite to wear, 5/5 pants.

评论概述: Incredibly comfortable, probably not incredibly durable
评论详情: For what they are, these pants are fantastic. They're comfortable, they fit well, and I love the blue color that I ordered. That said, this kind of pant in this kind of fabric are not going to last forever. With care they may last me a few years, but this fabric isn't super durable, so bear that in mind when making your decision.  For me, the pants are perfect. I'm 5'8", 167 pounds, and they wear nicely on my hips a little below my navel, which is exactly what I want because I have a stomach condition that causes me pain when my clothes press on my belly. If I wore them up at my natural waist, I don't think I'd find them as comfortable and the length would be above my ankle. Wearing them a little below my navel has the length perfectly a little below my ankle bone.

UPDATE!!!!! These are CRAP! Wore them once and they came apart! Washed them twice and the color bleeds! Was on a boat yesterday and sat on a white seat and because my bathing suit was wet, the dye bled through and the seat turned purple! I can just imagine what this dye is doing to my skin! Utter TRASH !!!!!!!!! Changed my 5 star rating to one and would do a zero if I could. Shame on this seller for selling such crap!!!  I just got mine today and absolutely love them. The material is super soft and they are super comfy. I am not expecting them to last a long time because the material is thin, but for $20, you can’t go wrong. I am ordering 6 more pair in different colors. They are perfect for warm weather, the beach, just chilling at home, even dressed up with a cute top and accessories. I am very happy with this purchase.

So I was excited for these. Fit as expected in sizing. They appeard to be a cottony material online. They are more of a linen. They are quite see thru when held to the light. Not sure in actual sunlight as I have not worn them yet. They appeared to have tighter ankle, than they actually do. And unless you are under 5'3, they are not going to do that cute little fold at the bottom due to length too short and lack of tightness at the ankle. Pokets are not really usable, they are further down than appear online. The material is soft despite it being more linen than cotton. Color and pattern are nice. They felt comfortable, nice, for the few mins I had them on. I will provide a pic when I wear them.

评论概述: So comfy and great in hot weather.
评论详情: The recommendation was for size Large. I should have gotten a small as large is too big and too long. I'm 5' tall with a 30 " waist. I do own a pair in small I bought second hand that come to just above my ankle and they fit fine, unfortunately no small were available.

I got all smalls, I am 5'5", 130lbs, 29" inseamI was looking for something lightweight for summer (I have skin cancer on my legs:-( , when I bought my first pair. I love the waist, which is about 10 rows of smocking, that make a flattering fit. They rest on top of my feet, not tight at the ankle, perfect. Others have complained about them tearing right away.  Just going to say these are not for heavier women that might put strain on the fabric and seams. I just wash them in the sink, cold water, squeeze them out, lay on a towel and roll up. I then hang them and gently smooth the wrinkles, they dry quickly. I love them so much I bought every lighter color! My only negative was the pockets, which are really just decorative. They were saggy, so I removed the bow and tacked the pocket closed.....just my preference.
I’ve purchased several of these boho pants. Always get a lot of compliments. Great for warm weather. Comfort, comfort.

Ordered these blue boho pants in XL. I’m an 18 in Maurice’s vigoss Jean’s. 5ft tall and 205-210 weight. Didn’t even try these on because of the hole In belly. I wanted to have these work so badly! I am dying to find a light pair of loose pants for these hot Vegas days. Well, when you order light… it’s apparently too thin of a fabric. I loved the weight but I never even got to wear them once. The 1st pic is near the seam by the belly. In between crotch and waist. Look carefully and see the hole? I would understand a rip on the seam but the is next to the seam. 2nd pic is the inside crotch area. See how thin this fabric is? If the wind blows to hard these are going to split. There’s no way around it. Even if your a sz zero ordering these in an xl… this thin fabric will never even make it through a wash basin gentle hand wash. I’m serious when I say the wind will rip it. 3rd pic is of the inside of the pant near the right leg pocket. See the light coming through at the seam of the pocket? Well, it just enforces the reality that the fabric is just too thin. Guess what we ask for is not realistic when it comes to construction. You can’t have super light fabric and expect to wear it. 😬 A woman can dream of the day super light fabric won’t be see through and that you can actually wear the fabric without expecting it to fall apart before you even put it on once. I’m super sad I’ve had to come to this reality.

I purchased these pants in Blue as a bathing suit coverup.  After reading reviews I sized way up.  In US sizing for elastic waist pants I am normally a Medium, unless the cut is junior or athletic then I sometimes need a Large for my waistline.  Since I ordered an XL and am only 5'2" they fit from my waist to ankle.  They are baggy in the bottom and thighs but since I often ride my bike to the beach, that's perfect and what I hoped for.I like that they are super light weight. Since other reviewers mentioned tearing during wash, I washed them inside a polyester lingerie bag in cold water with black clothes.  Unfortunately the lingerie bag has a blue tint - polyester using doesn't hold color well so the pants must have run a lot.  I'm hoping this was just a one time occurrence, if not I will update my review.I hung them dry and didn't notice any shrinkage.  No tears anywhere.  I'm a little nervous to wear them when I might be wet from my bathing suit and need to sit on light outdoor furniture.  But for the beach - they are perfect.

评论概述: A little on the thin side
评论详情: These fit good and are comfy, but very thin/ see through fabric would not recommend the white

评论概述: Love them , comfy but Don't order one size up!
评论详情: These pants very comfy! I am 5' 137, and took the advice of ordering size up and wished I had not. Small would have been fine, extra small probably would have been better! While wearing, this material has some give and feels more loose/ larger at the end of wear.....If you like extra loose, or have more junk in your trunk or thick thighs, your normal  size should do, or MAYBE consider ordering size up. Color did start to fade a little  into white on first day of wear ( did not wash, and no big deal, can barely see) washed on delicate and put in dryer on low to try and shrink.....did not damage pant..... I would buy again. Great comfy pant for price!

评论概述: Love them but they dont last
评论详情: Absolutely love these pants!  But I have only had them a little over a month and maybe have worn them 3-4 times and they are already ripping at the seams.  They are very thin material that just doesnt hold up.  I will be sewing them and ordering more.  Cheap enough for disposable pants.  I wore them on a cruise and in one of the ports they had the exact pants for $49.99!I am 5'3" and about 170 lbs and I ordered an XL.  They are big and loose, I probably could have ordered a L but these are very comfy and they are not too long at all.  I dont walk on them or anything.

These pants fit so well and are so comfortable that they’re perfect for the pandemic, stay at home lifestyle but they are a pain to wash.  I hand washed the first time and the blue dye just kept on coming so I put them in a mesh bag and ran them through the washer.  I don’t know if the dye still runs so this is my wash method of choice now.  The mesh bag has a slightly blue tinge now but I can live with that.  After hanging to dry, they were slightly wrinkled and that might be a problem if I ever left the house in them (or at all).  Because of the dye problem, these have to be washed alone so that’s another consideration.  All said, because I love the fit and feel I bought another pair in a different pattern.  I chose comfort and fit over washability but that’s just my personal choice.  I hope this helps you.

评论概述: Loved how they felt and fit but they tore…
评论详情: I was happy to find comfortable, breathable pants that fit my pear shaped body and even flattered it! Fit absolutely perfectly! Wore them for my Mexico trip (Tulum is especially boho) and I didn’t sweat or chafe or anything! Better than shorts ! Airy and a very nice pattern. Not too baggy but loose enough to flatter my big booty.  Sooooo bummed they tore in the crotch. I didn’t hear or feel them tear so I’m assuming it happened in the wash. I knew it was a possibility so I did delicate wash and hung to dry TWICE. Hand washed in Mexico once too. And that’s it! I might still order again, maybe a different color as the material looks a little different. They are very inexpensive so it’s not about the money it’s more that I really liked the fit and have a hard time finding well fitting clothes - I have high hips- quite wide, and a little extra in my waist. So I guess I would consider this a 2-3 use clothing which is kinda wasteful.

类型: Size: LargeColor: Bright Multicolor Tie Dye
评论详情: These are thin and can see through them. I think they are good for around the house and used as a swim suit cover up. I'm 5.6 150lbs and I got a large but would of been happier with a medium. They are baggy and the top part does stretch. I'm not sure if I'll keep they yet or not. For the price is good though.

评论概述: One size really does seem like it would fit all
评论详情: As I've said, these pants are adjustable to fit you no matter what your size. I like that I'll be able to eat a big meal and not have to feel like I'm suffocating when I'm wearing these. They're some of the most comfortable pants I own. I also really can appreciate how affordable these pants are. They're great for wearing around day and night. I think they would make a great gift as well, and I'm planning on buying more in the future for myself, my friends and sister. I can't think of anyone who could not like to have a pair.  Update: I had to take down a star. The quality of the stitching isn't the best, and my phone messed up one of the pockets after being in there for a couple of minuites. That being said, I don't regret buying these, they look good and I'm really comfortable in them. :)
Many compliments, super comfortable and great bouncing around pants. Match with cut T and sandles … adorable

These pants are really cute and good quality. I bought them for a quick beach coverup. Great for vacation to run around resort or hotel and not feel so exposed. Very flattering but the legs are very wide would prefer a little bit slimmer.
These pants are a real find. They are very unique and I get a lot of compliments when I wear them. They are super comfy. And you can bet I wear them often. I love um!

I really like these pants. The waistband is my favorite part. One thing I must mention. The second time I wore these, the crotch and inner thigh ripped open when I sat down on the floor . These pants are no where near tight on me, so it surprised me to see this. Then I realized the fabric is so thin, and the seams are somewhat delicate for this type of fabric. I had to sew the entire crotch back together all the while thinking it was a good thing I did not wear these to yoga class. House pants now. I cannot trust they won’t open back up when I go to sit down. I like the way they look on me. It’s why I made the effort to sew them back together.

I love these pants so much, extremely flattering and very comfortable…only downside is they’re a bit short for my 6ft height and the seam on the waist came undone after wearing only once. They are also a bit sheer but great in Florida weather😎

评论概述: Go up a size or 2 if you’re taller than average
评论详情: I wanted to get these to wear around the house, and I like them to be very loose and airy. I bought these in a large after reading some of the reviews and I’m glad I did. Any smaller and they wouldn’t have long enough or loose enough for what I was looking for. They’re still not quite as long as I would like. The elastic waist is totally fine; the pants aren’t going to slip down at all, even if you were a size 2 theyd stay up just fine  For reference I’m 5’7and 135 lbs, US size 4. I

评论概述: It was good but has some stains.
类型: Size: LargeColor: Bright Multicolor Tie Dye
评论详情: I like the fabric and the size was right, it just came with some yellow stains, like rust on the bottom and the waist.

评论概述: Color is off and not a fan of the pocket design
评论详情: I love this type of wide-shirred waisted yoga pants, and I've had a number of them in the past from different brands. These fit just a tad smaller than my Lannaclothesdesign pants, but close enough.  The thing I was really disappointed with is that the color is way off. I was expecting a nice teal and black effect, and got a very washed out baby blue and black. So, plan accordingly.  I might have tolerated the color thing if it hadn't been for the the pockets on the front of the leg. I much prefer my pockets on the side. And certainly, if you are going to put pockets on the front of the leg, please don't put bow ribbons on the pockets, it is, in my opinion, a very weird look.  All in all, I decided to return these pants.

评论概述: Looks awesome but material easily rips.  Fits smaller than sized
评论详情: I loved these pants. The material is a little thin and in the right light you can see through them. I was sad when I tried them on that they fit a little more snug than expected. Material does not have any elasticity. My pants ripped at the crotch after the third time of wearing them. This is a hand wash hang dry only. I wish they would have lasted a little longer and the material been a little more durable

My only complaint is that the teal color is not as vibrant as shown in the photo ... more of a light turquoise/spa blue-green.  Dye is otherwise as shown, fit and size are great. I am 5'2", 118 pounds, petite! bought size Small - waistband is not restrictive but still stays up whether wearing low-rise or at waist, length sits right below my ankle bone - remove the tag and you can fold over at waist for less length. My 2nd pair of same style in different color cuz I liked the first pair so much I had to buy another. SUPER comfortable!

The pattern is very nice looking, the pockets are great, and the material feels wonderful. However I am 5'7 150 and bought the large. The smock waist is very roomy and not tight, so anyone with ' fluff' in the belly area this won't feel tight. It is true the elastic in the ankle is minimal, they're more like full legs, they do not come into the ankles at all, as their picture shows. The legs were also very long, my inseam is usually a 31 and these will fall over my sandals.  I hope my review helps buyers

These are nice summer type loungewear, quite comfy (thin and breezy material). I’m 5’9” with long legs so these are not long on me. The pockets are neat, but if I put my phone in them they slip down the waist a bit. The only reason I gave 4 instead of five stars is that I ordered black and received white. I’m too lazy to return them, I wanted comfortable lounging pants now. Also - just a note that the white pants are rather see through so...yeah probably wouldn’t wear them outside of the house unless you’re one of those Walmart people.
The pants are very sheer.  So if you dont mind your underwear showing you may not want to buy this
While these are super comfy, I can see the seams start coming apart....They will be fine for pajamas.
delivery was one day late but liked item when it came

I cannot say enough about how amazing these pants are. I am in my third trimester and have been searching for comfortable pants - after they arrived I immediately ordered 2 more pairs. The stretchy top allows them to sit comfortably on the baby bump. My only complaint is that they hit right at my ankle. I wish they were half an inch longer, but they’re perfect for around the house or a quick walk to the mailbox. Highly recommend for expecting mamas.
I like the comfort but as I am 5'3" the length is a tad bit short.

I've worn this about 8 times, just as lounge wear at home and the seam at the waist and crotch is coming apart. The other 2 I bought are okay still, maybe I haven't worn them as much. Very lightweight cotton. Would not recommend for yoga, maybe dancing? Probably just as pjs or lounge pants. The fabric is very soft. Oh, if you're thicker... these aren't flattering. They make my tummy look 2x bigger than it is. Just fyi

评论概述: You get what you paid for.
类型: Size: LargeColor: Bright Multicolor Tie Dye
评论详情: I love these pants as long as they specify that they are manufactured of 100% rayon, because I have occasionally ordered them and they're made from 100% polyester, and polyester doesn't feel, drape or look nearly as good as the rayon.Don't expect them to last for any length of time if worn a lot they're pretty flimsily put together, and the smocking soon gets stretched out.So why do you buy them if they are so badly made, you ask?  Well, for the price I love the colours and the drape.  They are so comfortable and you can wear them anywhere.  My favorite style are the design with the two small pockets sewn onto the front mid thigh.

评论概述: New favorite pants! But they ripped in the wash 😕
类型: Size: LargeColor: Bright Multicolor Tie Dye
评论详情: More comfortable and flattering than I expected! I want them in every color! Update: after the first wash they ripped at the seam in the crotch area 😫

评论概述: Comfy light and airy lounge pants, great for hot days!
评论详情: These are very comfortable! Light airy roomy pants. I only didn't give them 5 stars because some of the stitching around the two front pockets just missed the pocket fabric leaving a couple holes on the sides of the pockets, but easily stitched up. And I love the print and color! I'm 5' 4" 130lbs and the medium fits perfect with some room but short enough that it doesn't slide under my heels. Love them!

评论概述: A must have go to pant.
评论详情: I own a pair in every color! I wear them for all occasions. So comfy and easy to play with how you style your look in many ways. They are pretty sheer so white undies or a swimsuit is a must. The pockets are great they hold my iPhone 10XR with room left. The waist band is very well made and wide so you can roll the pants up into it and it kind of looks like a belt. The inseam is long! Not MC Hammer pants long but mid thigh long. True bohemian cut. I am 5”7 135 lbs. I am slender in all areas but they provide room for an ass if you have one. Lol

评论概述: So comfy! I love these pants.
评论详情: I ordered 2 pairs and love them so much that I just ordered 3 more. I usually wear a small but they only had medium so I got them. I'm glad I did because these kinds of pants look better a little loose rather than snug. They're light and airy.

评论概述: Ad doesn't show front pockets with strings.  Two strings hang down from each front pocket.
评论详情: I like the fabric, fit, and pattern.  The front pockets are okay, but the strings on the pockets are kind of strange.

So lightweight and comfortable! Wore these in the Cayman Islands and they were perfect! A little on the thin side but black underwear took care of that. Loved them so much I bought another pair in a different color also!

评论概述: Thumbs Up! Very User Friendly in All Areas
评论详情: These pants were much as  I expected from the pictures , which is nice. The fabric is not see -through,  but extremely light weight. They are very comfortable and totally user friendly because they have an adjustable type waist band with flexible but strong, elastic that looks good as it is,  or it can be rolled down if you prefer low-rider waist  . Did not shrink to doll size on the first wash. Thumbs up!
Just a little baggie for my taste but I wear them all the time because of how light and comfy they are
They look white and black in the picture but are really a cream and black. No biggie because I still like them. Comfy.

Seriously cute. Look exactly like the pic. A little short on me - but - I’m 5’ 8.5” ish, so not unexpected (they come to right above my ankles. The material is soooooo soft and lightweight, I’m curious to see how well it will hold up because of this (will update after a couple wash/wears). I purchased the large 145lbs) and it’s perfect. Definitely considering buying another pair because of how comfortable these are. Side note: since these are white with a sparse printing of fish, you definitely need to wear nude underwear because the fabric - isn’t completely sheer, you can definitely see through.

评论概述: Poor quality, color bleeds, stiches unravel.
评论详情: I was obsessed with the White/Turquoise version of this. Ordered twice and kept receiving the wrong color (white/blue) instead.  The fit and look are great, even tough I was a bit disappointed at first that the white is see-through.  The greatest disappointment was how much the darker colors run under cold water wash and bled into the white. I can never wash this with other clothes, it will ruin them. Furthermore, one of the elastic bands that are sown into the belt area unraveled on the first wear. Sadly I discovered all this when it was too late to return.  The fabric is as low grade as it come, what a shame, with such a nice design.

First off I  love these pants. The label said to hand wash in cold water BEFORE wearing. I did this, thank goodness. Lots of gray color came out. Left with nice washed out look like picture (when I  opened package they were very dark gray, after washing they look really nice). Very light material. Great for summer.
The pants are cute but are cheaply made and a little short.

Pros: These pants are comfy and cute.  I received compliments all day.  I’m 5”7 160 pounds.  Smaller waist, wider hips and butt.  A medium fit me well.  Con:  Fades on first wash.  I washed separately in the sink with Woolite and cold water…  That beautiful blue went right down the drain. The color never stopped fading.  I’m afraid to wash again.

Love the style and fit. I'm 5'2" an 120lbs. The medium fit as the style shows it should. Only issue i have is the color bleeding. I purchased the dark blue. I can understand the first wash however, Ive washed many times now and the dye always bleeds. So forever needs to be washed separately.

Great light cotton pants , I'm 5'7' and 166 lb and the L fits me perfect . Will buy more but not all of them are the same material. The colors that are wider in legs and at the bottom are more like polyester.

These are my favorite pants of all time! The fabric is wonderful and softens over time even more. The colors are more amazing than in the photos. I now have eight pairs of them each different ones. I love them so much that I even waited months for a few pairs of pants. Also as you wear them throughout the day they do expand in size by about one extra size. I know that they can almost fit everybody. I am five seven and 180 pounds and they're perfect🥰
Needed to wear something lite to work because it’s been so hot! You don’t stick to them and they are light and super comfortable. Super cute pants, you could dress up or down in them for sure.

评论概述: Looks Great!! Fits better after the fabric relaxes...
评论详情: These pants look GREAT and go well with my other clothing. Really make a statement. However, they are a tad bit tight in the legs (wish the legs had a bit more room)... they do loosen up after a couple wearings though. I'm highly likely to purchase another pair of pants from this vendor.

评论概述: I love these but they fell apart immediately.
评论详情: I love the way the material is, how it’s breathy, soft, comfortable, and easy to wear. While wearing this particular pair, the seams on the inside of my legs just started falling apart from crotch to knee,  in less than 24 hours. I hope the rest are not like this because I ordered the largest size and they fit comfortably.  I will update or add reviews as I wear the others but I might as well keep these on through the rest of the day. These would have received a rating of 5 stars if they had lasted for more than a day. I was hoping these would be my summer pants 😫 and I had previously ordered the large and decided to get more but go up in size to make them looser and ordered 5 in different colors.

I love these pants, however the light colors are see through.  I would recommend going darker.  Other than that my only other complaint is I wish there were more solid colors available. (no small in charcoal.)

The pants are very cute made from a  crepey material which is perfect for dressing up or down, the pockets in the front are for aesthetics and add to the overall style. The only problem is the mediums are way too big and length is long. I'd say if you are between 5' - 5'8 and weigh less than 130 and want to buy these pants, definitely order the small.  I gave mine away. I have a feeling the small will be on the larger size considering how big the mediums are. I wish someone would post the measurements of the small.

Bought these to wear during my early days of pregnancy and had to return. I'm 5'9" and these were so unflatteringly short despite ordering a size up (Large). They were also tighter in the legs than expected and somewhat see thru. Bummed they didn't work out.
I bought the white...Yes they are see through but they're very cute.  These are  more  capris than full length

类型: Size: LargeColor: Bright Multicolor Tie Dye
评论详情: Cute. I've enjoyed but the waist stretches out a lot over time. They're my around the house pants now.

These are great pants for summer and the beach. I am 5’9 130lbs and the medium fits me perfectly - I sized for them to fit just right and not too loose. They are long enough and the elastic at the bottom is relaxed so they don’t get stuck on my calf after I sit. They are cute, give me a good butt and are comfortable and soft. The Casual Gypsy Print is not see through even they are very light weight. I am crazy about these pants and highly recommend.

评论概述: Great for lounging, summer or when we can eventually be in public again
评论详情: I love these pants. If they had more options in dark colors I would own more. The only reason I left 4 stars instead of 5 is there is already a small tear in the inner seam above my knee. Super easy fix just disappointed it happened right away. I would still buy these again.

LOVE this style harem pant. I have many colors/brands of this style and they are soooo comfortable. I ordered the turquoise tie dye pair this time and was not disappointed. The color is MUCH lighter than the photo, more of a powder blue/aqua vs a true deep teal/turquoise color but I still like them. Get a pair - you will not be disappointed!

Love these! I’m returning however because my stomach is a bit wide at the moment lol ... love handles. The wide waiste band just makes me look wider. Maybe I’ll repurchase once I lose weight. I’d not recommend for those who have wide stomach or super wide hips unless you have a very narrow contrasting wrist line... otherwise you just look boxy and wide . Fit nice everywhere else . Love the color , style and pattern. Love the front pockets .

These pants are super cute but very see through. Even folded in half you can see through them in the light. I will be wering them mostly around the house so no worries but you will need panties underneath if you wear them in the sunlight...lol

The pants in the picture are amazing and very low cut on the waist.  The pants I got are high waisted ,I wear a 4 or 5 usually but due to reviews I sized up in last minute angst on my decision.  So the pants I got were a medium but had I gotten a small the waist still would have been a high waist.  So I'm ultimately very bummed about this purchase as I can't wear them because they puff me up like a marshmello and are not at all flattering as the picture would show them. Oh and the waist printing stopped 3/4's of the way around the waist band and it just looks terrible and unfinished. Money wasted

I’m 5’4’’ and weigh 145lbs. I ordered the medium. They hit the bottom of my ankle and they are roomy. They are a little thin which is great for a warm spring day or if you live somewhere where it’s humid. I’m going to order another pair in a small. I like pants like that to hit the top of my ankle.
My family is sick of me wearing them they are so comfortable definitely going to be buying more  the only problem is they bleed alot  you have to wash buy hand or alone Still worth it

The colors and patterns are beautiful.I bought 3 pairs 2 for myself and 1 for a gift. I washed them by hand in cold water and air dried. I absolutely loved them. The seams began to let go. The fabric is so fragile! I bought a size up so the seems had NO tention.  I am very disappointed! Both pair wore out around the same time about 1 months after I bought them. Also the stitching around the waist is coming loose. I think maybe the thread is dry rot. Update: I returned these pants, 2 pairs, and only received partial money. The customer rep said it was because it was over the time aloted. These pants will only last a short time and the company makes a lot of money because you can not get a full return on them.

I gave up on jeans LOL  I normally wear a medium and purchased a medium in hopes to encourage myself to lose the weight that I've gained during this pandemic.  Well... They fit perfect!  And when I lose the weight, I know they will still fit in saying that the elastic has give and wow are they cool in the heat!  LOVE THEM AND ABOUT TO BUY SOME MORE!!!  PS I'M NOT A ROBOT WRITING FAKE REVIEWS :-)

评论概述: Order true to size. Their chart measurements run big.
评论详情: The sizing chart is way off. I’m 50 inches in the hip so ordered a 3x. It is WAY too big. Returned and ordered a XL. Cute pattern and nice airy material that is not see through

I’m 5’1, so I expected them to be a little long. I love how they look and fit. But I’m worried about how they’ll do when I wash them since I just got them and haven’t washed them yet. But very comfortable!!!
The pants we so dark (grey)  I couldn't see the design on them.  Returned
Love the feel and the fit pockets were a little low but it’s ok, the cotton was a bit sheer but it’s really not too much of an issue. Got a lot of compliments for sure! May buy other colors

评论概述: I love them except they are a little too small which ...
评论详情: I love them except they are a little too small which makes them too short. If you are taller than 5'5 I would not buy. I bought an XL and I'm giving them to my daughter who wears a Medium. They are definitely not as flowy and comfy as others I have bought. They are really nice looking but unfortunately I think after 1 wash, they'll shrink even more.

I ordered 2 sizes up because I wanted good flow. Super glad I did. I'm 5'2", 118 lbs. Ordered a large. Probably could've gotten away with a medium. I ordered the teal and white and they are very see through. I washed them right away because they had a horrible smell. I washed them on gentle and dried them on med heat. The fabric endured well, the stitching not so much. It's like they have equal pros and cons....

These pants are super cute, but the seller is even better. I had returned the pair I received as they had a small hole in them and were sewn where they shouldn't have been. The seller reached out to me and seemed upset I had received a poor quality item and asked if they could send me another pair. Great customer service and I would gladly buy again from this seller. These pants are beyond comfortable.

类型: Size: LargeColor: Bright Multicolor Tie Dye
评论详情: Absolutely horrible - Shredded and ripped in more places that I can count. The sad thing is when I send them back I think they’re just gonna send them to someone else! Because surely this is what happened to me being the crotch is totally ripped out not sloppily sewn. Im sad because I really liked the fabric print, and these one of the few styles I like the fit. I bought a pair of pants exactly like this by the same brand name while in Mexico, and they were not ripped. I wear them quite often. Because I love them so much I looked all over the web for this style and found these and despite some bad reviews I decided to take a chance. Don’t bother, don’t take this chance, don’t buy these thenquality is horrible, and I’m sure they resend their returns without any regard to new customers. Stores like this do not deserve business and I wish I hadn’t given them any!

类型: Size: X-LargeColor: Lime Allovr Tie Dye
评论详情: I've ordered several of these and live in them during the summer.  Extremely lightweight, but not sheer.  Nice printing job on them.  The seams will rip easily if subjected to pressure....so inexpensive I have on occasion replaced a torn one with a new one because they are so inexpensive.  They're great.
Love, love, love these!! The colors are just as vibrant as pictured. They are super comfy and cool for summer. Might just buy more.

I like these pants a lot, but they are definitely not what I expected. In the picture they are shown a bright turquoise and they were more like a faded baby blue. I would buy again because they are comfy, but definitely keep in mind the color is not as pictured!

First, I love the color, pattern & design! These had the potential to be great pants. BUT, the quality of material is so thin just sitting pulled the seams so the fabric separated. After 2 wears, I can only use these as material for crafts, not to wear. I'm very sad about that because I really loved these until the fabric issues & seam issues.  I'm well aware of how to care for these pants, I own many.... Unfortunately these are very cheaply made.

I love these pants. I recommend going up a size but i like looser fitting pants. The fabric is great, they wash well, the rise is not too high or too low, and they feel and look great. The fabric is thin but not too thin. Its great for warm days but too thin for chilly days. I love these pants so much i ordered more. I get compliments every time i wear them. Great for the value. I wish they had them in more colors.
These are O comfortable to wear out or just kick in’ st vine. Love the colors s d fabric!

评论概述: They will last with good care and add sexy to any occasion.
评论详情: These are absolutely a good buy and ideal for warm weather. Your legs stay cool because of airy material that I will add here to wash alone on gentle and hang dry. You can dress up or down. My fail to the order was hitting the 3x when I need a medium. Now I am waiting for Ingear to stock the medium in the black. Highly recommend!

评论概述: The fabric is unlike the other 5 I've ordered.
评论详情: Fabric feels like curtains. Terrible.  Will not order these again. I really loved the 1st 5 pairs. Disappointing that I can't get a refund. I didn't think to check on the fabric since I've ordered so many before. It's false advertising for sure.
Bought for 12yr old daughter vday. She loves them. Super soft and just enough boho for her hippyish style. Not too disgusting like some of her choices. All in all I'd let her leave the house in them.
These pants are so extremely comfortable. They fit to size in my opinion. I just ordered than in another color. Hopefully they are just as comfy 😁
La tela es igual a la de la imagen y de muy buena calidad; la hechura está perfecta.
I LOVE these pants. They are soooo comfortable and cool for this warm weather that's been happening. Super flattering and not too high waisted, which is a bonus for me!
and so is my wife who I bought them for.
Too small but really cute!

评论概述: Nice colors but fell apart after 3 washes
评论详情: Very comfortable and not sheer. After three washes the pants basically fell apart at the seams and holes happened

They're pretty comfortable. Could be worn in extreme heat and still be comfortable. I'm 5'6 with average length legs and the pants have great length for a large. I have very thick thighs and they still fit loose. I took off a star for the incredibly cheap fabric, that would tear apart if a worm wiggled it's way across. A second star taken off because they sent me the wrong pants. LoL I paid for a different pair.

评论概述: I expect some seepage of color for first few hand ...
评论详情: I expect some seepage of color for first few hand washes, but after three times with a sink full of color still appearing  I let them set. So after 3-4 hours soaking and refilling, still releasing tons of color. Even tried lemon juice and vinegar. So, with indigo stained hands going to let dry, but seems the fabric was dyed and never rinsed at all before making. I don't know if you want to wear to exercise for quiet a while.

Love these !! Very thin but that's what I wanted, Florida in the summer is miserably hot and I dont like wearing shorts so these have been a life saver.  I'm 5'2" at 180lbs, the xl are perfect , not snug, very nice to lounge in as well. I have all of them, now mind you the light color ones are see through so color coordinate your undies, lol. But a must have!!

评论概述: Can't be folded at the waist because of the TAG in the back .
评论详情: Pants are cute but could be longer as I am 5'5 and they are at my my ankle bone so when you sit they rise up , not great for taller people . The reason it only gets 3 stars is because they CAN NOT be folded at the waist as the description describes because there are 2 big tags in the bag which can be seen when folded over .
